resources.string: This app was inspired by an article on the happiest man in the world. The takeaway from the article is that spending just several minutes a day thinking happy thoughts can have a huge impact on how we think over time. Observing how our brain switches from emotion to emotion is crucial to train our brain to think more positively. This app aims to keep the brain engaged with the app continuously for the selected duration through visualization and interaction. With enough practice thinking happy thoughts for a certain period daily, the mind can learn to let negative thoughts simply pass by instead of clinging to them.
